cc_text.paragraph: There may be times when you need to refer to a contract and you’re far from an Internet connected device, or you may just want a copy of the contract details on hand for quick reference. You can get this readily available copy by printing a contract data sheet.
The demonstration below describes the steps for printing a contract data sheet. Select Play to view the demonstration.
In the Data Grid, check any or all the checkboxes next to the Contract Number(s) to select the contract data sheet(s) to print.
Click the Result Actions dropdown list. The Result Actions dropdown list expands.
A new bowser window opens and a File Download dialog box displays with information about the generated PDF contract data sheet.
Select Open. Note that at this point you also have the option to save the data sheet to a location on your computer, instead of printing it.
The document opens in your default PDF viewer.
In your PDF viewer’s Menu Bar, select File. From there you can either save the data sheet to a location on your computer, or print out a copy.
